heading: Secret Chesswords
description: is a cooperative game where you use clue words to guide the other player's moves. (2 players, chess set, letter tiles, and deck of cards)

heading: Split-Brain Chess
description: is a battle between partnerships, if they can cooperate well. (4 players, chess set, a coin or checker, plus a piece of paper, a pen, and a pencil for each player)

heading: Gravity Chess
description: has both players move in the same direction, trying to stack pieces higher. (2 players, chess set, and deck of cards)

heading: Parade Chess Solitaire
description: requires pieces to move each other into a connected group. (1 player, chess set, and deck of cards)

heading: Booster Chess
description: uses cards to boost your chess army. (2 players, chess set, checkers set, and deck of cards)

heading: Neighbour Chess Solitaire
description: moves pieces using their neighbours' moves to form one connected group. (1 player, chess set, and deck of cards)

heading: Cloak and Dagger Chess
description: is a game where you disguise your chess pieces as checkers, then try to identify your opponent's pieces. (2 players, chess set, checkers set, pen, and tape)
